name: CineCam
short_desc: Cinematic camera control for Godot games
long_desc: CineCam is a plugin that provides a simple but powerful method to deal with multi-camera systems and animating camera transitions. It aims to allow the user to replicate real life cinematographic movement in 3D scenes, offering advanced camera control and a transition systems integrated seamlessly with the Godot Editor.

name: Gists Browser
short_desc: A tool for browsing the public Github Gists of a user
long_desc: Browse the public gists of any Github users with this SPA built using React.js, Typescript and Sass.

name: Movie Backend
short_desc: A demo Django movie API for a university assignment
long_desc: Demo backend written in Django, using django-rest-framework. This API was written as a university assignment, hosted on Google Cloud, and connected to a PostgreSQL server hosted on the same platform. The backend has been stress tested with ~10 million database entries and works flawlessly, including proper request pagination.

name: Pythonic Obstruction
short_desc: A console-based implementation of the game Obstruction
long_desc: A console-based implementation of the game Obstruction, written for both player versus player and player versus computer play, as part of a University assignment.
